name: Hardworking Ninja
description: Shin is the tutor of Academy. He probably can show you some moves if he sees potential.

dialogs.dialog: You are [character_name], right? I am the tutor of this Academy, Shin. Defeat the training dummy and show me what you got.

name: Blacksmith's Request
description: Retrieve Kenta's precious weapon that was stolen by Ninja Bandits.

dialogs.dialog: Hi [character name]! I am Kenta, the famous ninja blacksmith of Fire Village.
I have a mission for you.
My weapon was stolen. Could you get it back for me?

name: Confidential Document
description: Deliver the document to the destination. Beware of assassins.

dialogs.dialog: Deliver the confidential letter to the Black Ops centre outside the village. Enemies may attack you. Be careful!

name: Weaver's Request
description: Retrieve Mai's Golden Silk taken by Female Ninja Bandits.

dialogs.dialog: Hi [character name]! I am Mai! I used to be a ninja just like you, but I decided to carry on with our family business. Weaving ninja cloths has been a tradition in our family.
Yesterday, a group of female ninja stole the Golden Silk from my home. It is the most expensive silk! Can you take it back for me?

name: Conflicts with the Samurai
description: Ninja and samurai have been rivals for a long time. Recently, the confrontation has meet its climax!

dialogs.dialog: Recently our conflict with the samurai has intensified! A few samurai just broke into the village and created disturbances! Dispatch them, quick!

name: Michi's Request
description: Deliver Michi's medical supplies to the neighboring town.

dialogs.dialog: Hi [character_name]! I am Michi, the head nurse of the village.
Please help us to deliver some medical supplies to the neighboring town. They are suffering from a shortage.

name: Yuna's Request
description: Deliver some Sweet Dangos.

dialogs.dialog: [Character_name], I am Yuna, I make delicious Dango and Onigiri. I am also good at making ramen. If ramen is your thing, maybe you should try mine.
There is a festival in the neighbouring town. Can you deliver these dangos to my dad? He is in the festival.

name: Find the Antidote
description: Defeat the enemies and get the antidote from them.

dialogs.dialog: We were just seized outside the village... some of us are poisoned by their weapons... Get us the antidote! Go!

name: Grandmother's Gift
description: Help Aiko's grandmother buy a gift for her.

dialogs.dialog: Hello, can you help me buy a Pearl Kunai for Aiko? It is her birthday tomorrow.

name: Fake Worshippers
description: Save the White Monk's temple from the Wandering Monks.

dialogs.dialog: I have a mission for you. The White Monks have come to us for help. The Wandering Monks have been disturbing their temple.

name: Attack from Ninja Pirates
description: Protect the Merchant Ships

dialogs.dialog: A group of Ninja Pirates are attacking the Merchant ships now! Some ninjas have already been there fighting the Pirates. Go there and assist them!

name: Kusuma's Request
description: Kusuma is extorted by hooligans. He wants you to defeat them.

dialogs.dialog: Good... Good morning. I am Kusuma, the store owner. A group of hooligans threatened to burn down my store unless I pay them a lot of Gold.
They will be back in a moment. Can you help me cast them away?

name: Kage's Son
description: Save Norobi from the kidnappers.

dialogs.dialog: Yudai and I are very worried... being the son of the Hokage might bring him danger... we are afraid the Hokages enemies would kidnap Norobi as revenge. Can you help me to look for him?

name: It's the Samurai Again
description: Oldest Ninja rivals, the samurais are disturbing our villagers again!

dialogs.dialog: Hi [character name]. The samurais are back. They have gathered outside the temple and are trying to create disturbances. Please cast them away.

name: Assassinate the Ninja Spy Leader
description: Assassinate the Ninja Spy Leader who wants to attack our village.

dialogs.dialog: We have located the leader of the ninja spy. He is in the forest. Assassinate him.

name: Undead Marionette
description: Three undead Marionette have appeared in the street! Hokage wants you to eliminate them... wait, why are the Marionette there?

dialogs.dialog: There are some unknown weird-looking creatures are wandering in the village and have frightened the villagers. I want you to eliminate them. Catch them alive if possible, I want to investigate what kind of creatures they are.

name: Kenta's Favor
description: Kenta wants you to get him a special white stone. The function of the stone is still a secret.

dialogs.dialog: It is good to see you again! I am making a new weapon but I need a special white stone. It is very rare but it can be found in the forest. Careful, some fierce beasts lurk in that area.

name: Trouble from Hooligans
description: Yuna's restaurant is disturbed by hooligans. Help her to expel the villians.

dialogs.dialog: I need your help again. Recently, a group of hooligans have been disturbing my restaurant! They refused to pay for what they ate!
When I asked them for the Gold, they just destroyed the tables and chairs! They are such a trouble! Can you help me to expel them?

name: Clear Main Artery
description: The ninja thieves are blocking the main artery. Cast them away.

dialogs.dialog: I need to deliver this newly-made gown to my client. But the ninja thieves have blocked the road. Can you clear it for me?

name: Troublesome Water Ninja
description: The young Water Ninja always disturb the ships on the port. Fight against them!

dialogs.dialog: Some young Water Ninjas always disturb the business ships in the nearby small village. They came to us for help. Teach the naughty Water Ninja a lesson!

name: Where are the Hooligans?
description: Shin found the hiding place of the hooligans. Help him catch the bad guys!

name: Night Rebellion
description: In the world of ninja, night is not for rest, but fights!

name: Canine Tooth Collection
description: Help Blacksmith Kenta collect canine tooth from beasts in the forest.

name: Phantom Ninja
description: Pursuit with the Phantom Ninja.

name: War with Samurai
description: The samurai has declared war on us.

name: The Ninja Assassinates
description: Assassination problem is serious. Look for the leader.

name: Zuka's Request
description: Zuka, the bloodline user from the Snow Village needs your help!

name: Toxic Crisis
description: Toxic ninja are planning to hurt the villagers!

name: Medicine Research
description: Michi is requesting for a sample of Wind Village's new medicine.

name: Crazy Marionette
description: Marionettes appear in the village again! It must be Ken's great job!

name: The Secret Package from Yuna
description: Yuna has a secret package for Mizukage... what could that be?

name: Help the Snow Village
description: Yuna has a secret package for Mizukage... what could that be?

name: The Skeletons
description: It's time to clean up mess for Ken again!

name: Escaped Prisoner - Hanjiro
description: Catch the escaped Hanjiro.

name: Escort Kaiza
description: Kaiza needs a ninja to escort him to the Village of Water.

name: Wind Village Defend
description: Wind village is under attack! However, Kazekage is having a meeting in Lightning Village.

name: Urgent Request from Michi
description: Deliver Michi's medicines to the injured black ops.

name: Violent Hooligans
description: Violent hooligans are destroying the village! Please stop them.

name: Merchant Assassination
description: Capture the unsuccessful assassin who was ordered to assassinate Kaiza

name: Mountain Bandits
description: An Intel reports that a group of mountain bandits harass passerby.

name: Concern of Norobi
description: As the son of Hokage, Norobi's life is full of 'surprises'!

name: Guard the land of Hisao !
description: As the son of Hokage, Norobi's life is full of 'surprises'!

name: The Antique Vase
description: Villains are going to break into Kaiza's Mansion to steal an invaluable antique vase!

name: The Fire-Thunder Alliance
description: Eliminate the Mountain Bandits who are active at the boundary between the Village of Fire & Thunder.

name: The Mysterious Mist
description: Strange mist in the forest... what is going on?

name: Blacksmith's Trouble
description: Help Kenta drive battle dogs away from his place

name: Assassin's Plot
description: Catch the assassins before they can mess up the village!

name: The Criminal Gathering
description: Find out the criminals' plan!

name: Kinjutsu: Marionette Control
description: The Scroll of Kinjutsu is stolen from Ken!

name: Fierce Cats Gone Wild
description: There are too many of them!

name: Hunt the Rebel
description: Disunite the rebels before they could do anything.

name: The Dessert Ronins
description: A group of ronins are messing around in the dessert!

name: The Soil Intruders
description: Intel reports existence of intruders!

name: Fight back for the mining field!
description: The mining field is occupied, go and get it back!

name: Save the temple!
description: A group of evil monks have occupied a temple, you have to save the temple!

name: Return the valuables
description: Return the wrong delivery

name: Return the valuables
description: Return the wrong delivery

name: Mystery Shadow
description: There are many Soil Ninja working on something in the forest, go and investigate them!

name: The Legendary Weapon
description: Kaiza heard a rumor about the legendary weapon, he is asking you to come with him. Is this a trap?

name: The Bandit All Stars
description: There is a rumor about the bandit gathering, is this some kind of worst plan?

name: Moyai Island
description: Find the Hidden Treasure in Moyai Island!

name: Loot Gathering 1
description: Gather All the Gold!

name: Loot Gathering 2
description: Gather All the Gold!

name: Loot Gathering 3
description: Gather All the Gold!

name: Forest Campers 1
description: Experienced Assassin Who Lurking in the Forest!

name: Forest Campers 2
description: Experienced Assassin Who Lurking in the Forest!

name: Forest Campers 3
description: Experienced Assassin Who Lurking in the Forest!

name: Twins Unicorn
description: Go to challenge the Patron Saint of the forest

name: Sage Power Seal
description: Unseal the scroll and obtain SS.

name: Balance Control
description: Make the counter balance to earn SS.

name: Sage Sealed Boxes
description: Unseal the boxes seal to get more SS.

name: Grade S - Stage 1
description: Story intro: master and genin pre-fight, master need to know those genin ability.

name: Grade S - Stage 2
description: Story intro: master leads genins for mission.

name: Grade S - Stage 3
description: Story intro: run around and look for the missing genin.

name: Grade S - Stage 4
description: Story intro: Little Mang want to be strong, He went to train by himself, but got caught by rebels.

name: Grade S - Stage 5
description: Story intro: get into enemy cave and get back the Antidote.

name: Forest Guardians
description: Strong beings inhabit this forest, be cautious.

description: Stage 2 Battle 1

name: Stage 2 Battle 2
description: Stage 2 Battle 2

description: Stage 3

description: Stage 4
